column1: Topic title: Good for Pakatan Harapan if PAS exco remains in S

column8: EpkBaiMhL7UGood for Pakatan Harapan if PAS exco remains in S;gor, says RafiziPublished on May 14, 2017A decision by PAS to remain in the Selangor administration despite breaking ties with PKR could benefit the Pakatan Harapan federal opposition, PKR vice-president Rafizi Ramli said today.In arguing this, Rafizi said this was because voters tend to observe the behaviours of politicians over a longer period of time and each day the three excos remain in government will mean that PAS loses more votes from fence sitters and Malay votersHe said what PAS excos are doing by remaining in the Selangor government will just prove further that it's about positions and rewards and less about their struggle and principles.
